issues.description: Hero 2-column grid may push CTA below fold on laptops, killing conversion path
issues.rationale: 60/40 split with bullets could exceed 768px viewport height, burying primary action

issues.description: Sticky CTA at 40% scroll depth creates 2-second conversion gap on mobile
issues.rationale: Users decide within first 8 seconds; delayed CTA misses prime conversion window

issues.description: Audit log pattern lacks social proof integration, missing trust amplification
issues.rationale: Technical logs without user count/activity volume fail to demonstrate platform adoption

issues.description: Problem/solution merge may create cognitive overload in single scan
issues.rationale: Two-column pain/solution forces mental ping-ponging, slowing 8-second comprehension

issues.description: Pricing moved higher without risk reversal context creates hesitation
issues.rationale: Price-first exposure before full value demonstration increases abandonment risk

issues.description: Proof chips placement below hero misses critical first-impression window
issues.rationale: Trust signals after hero fail to influence initial credibility assessment

issues.description: 75ch line length may exceed mobile readability on landscape orientation
issues.rationale: Wider mobile screens could stretch text beyond comfortable reading width

issues.description: 12px button radius may appear dated compared to current 8px design trends
issues.rationale: Overly rounded buttons can signal older design patterns, reducing perceived innovation

issues.description: Section dividers may fragment flow and increase visual noise
issues.rationale: Additional visual elements between sections could disrupt reading rhythm

issues.description: Visibility panel position after how-it-works delays trust building
issues.rationale: Trust demonstration comes after process explanation, missing early credibility boost

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 50/50 grid with max-height 600px constraint and compress bullets to 2 lines max
